snippet: Sweden’s starting goalie, Valentina Wallner, was under siege from the start, and though she did an admirable job, she was buried in a scoring onslaught by the Americans, who reached the gold-medal game against Canada.
abstract: United States women's hockey team defeats Sweden, 6-1, in Winter Olympic semifinals; they will meet Canada in gold medal game.
lead_paragraph: Sweden’s starting goalie, Valentina Wallner, was under siege from the start, and though she did an admirable job, she was buried in a scoring onslaught by the Americans, who reached the gold-medal game against Canada.

headline.main: U.S. Bombards One Swedish Goaltender, Then Another
headline.print_headline: U.S. Bombards One Swedish Goaltender, Then Another
